text: Awestruck by the Met. Spent hours there. Also tried real New York pizza - lives up to the hype!
Bittersweet. Last day in New York. It's been an incredible week, but I miss Nibbles and my routine.
Jetlagged but happy to be home. Nibbles seems to have grown while I was away. Lots of cuddles.
Motivated to get back to the gym after the trip. Also, started a new anime series recommended by a friend in New York.
Challenged at work. New project looks daunting, but I'm eager to learn.
Amused by a dream I had about Nibbles piloting a Gundam. Maybe I'm watching too much anime before bed.
Skeptical of all the 'news' today. April Fools' Day is not my favorite. At least my colleagues' prank was pretty clever.
Focused on work. The new project is ramping up, and I'm deep in data analysis mode.
Frustrated with a bug in my code. Spent hours debugging, only to find a misplaced semicolon. Rookie mistake!
Proud of Nibbles. She finally learned to use her scratching post instead of my furniture. Small victories!
Excited about the upcoming anime convention. Just got my ticket and started planning my cosplay.
Determined to improve my deadlift. Watched a bunch of technique videos and feeling ready to apply the tips.
Nostalgic after finding my old Gameboy. Spent the evening playing Pok√©mon Red. Still remember all the cheats!
Worried about Nibbles. She's been coughing a bit. Vet appointment scheduled for tomorrow.
Relieved. Nibbles just has a slight cold. Medication and extra cuddles prescribed.
Accomplished! Presentation at work went really well. The team loved my data visualizations.
Sore but satisfied after a great leg day at the gym. New personal best on squats!
Intrigued by a new machine learning course I found online. Signed up immediately.
Stressed about the upcoming project deadline. Putting in extra hours. Grateful for coffee and understanding colleagues.
Ecstatic! We submitted the project on time, and the client is thrilled with the results. Time for a well-deserved break.
Entertained by the latest episodes of 'One Piece'. How does this series keep getting better?
Proud of my cosplay progress. The armor is coming together nicely. Can't wait for the convention!
Amused by Nibbles' reaction to my cosplay. She's not sure what to make of it. Lots of curious sniffing.
Excited! The anime convention starts tomorrow. Cosplay is ready, schedule is planned. It's go time!
Exhilarated after the anime convention weekend. Met so many great people, got tons of merchandise, and my cosplay was a hit!
Exhausted but content. Getting back into my routine after the convention. Nibbles seems happy to have me home full-time again.
Motivated to try some new workout routines. The convention reminded me I want to cosplay as All Might next year!
Frustrated with the summer heat. The gym feels like a sauna. Might need to adjust my workout schedule.
Proud of my progress in the online machine learning course. The projects are challenging but rewarding.
Amused by Nibbles' latest obsession: watching birds from the window. She chatters at them for hours.
Excited about a potential promotion at work. My manager hinted at some upcoming opportunities. Time to step up my game!
Nostalgic after stumbling upon my old high school yearbook. Can't believe it's been 15 years already.
Determined to make the most of the second half of the year. Set some new fitness and career goals today.
Content after a relaxing Fourth of July. Watched the fireworks from my balcony with Nibbles (who was not a fan of the noise).
Stressed about the upcoming performance review at work. I know I've done well, but the anxiety is real.
Elated! Got an excellent performance review and... I'm being promoted! Can't wait to dive into my new responsibilities.
Overwhelmed but excited about my new role. So much to learn, but I'm up for the challenge.
Proud of maintaining my gym routine despite the busy week. Exercise really helps clear my mind.
Amused by the latest filler arc in my favorite ongoing anime. It's so bad it's good.
Concerned about Nibbles. She seems a bit lethargic. Booked a check-up, just to be safe.
Relieved that Nibbles is okay. Just the summer heat getting to her. Got some tips from the vet to keep her cool.
Excited to start my new data visualization project at work. It's a great opportunity to showcase my skills.
Frustrated with my lack of progress on deadlifts. Might need to consult a trainer to check my form.
Intrigued by a new sci-fi anime that just started. The premise is unique, and the animation is top-notch.
Nostalgic after a team-building event at work. We played old-school video games. I still got it in Mario Kart!
Anxious about presenting my project progress to the senior management next week. So much riding on this.
Thrilled! The presentation was a massive success. My visualizations really impressed the executives.
Grateful for my colleagues. They threw a small celebration for the project milestone. It meant a lot.
Determined to start learning a new programming language. Python has been great, but it's time to expand my toolkit.
Amused by Nibbles' attempts to 'help' me code. Keyboard walks are apparently essential to the process.
Refreshed after a relaxing Labor Day weekend. Binged a classic anime series and tried out some new healthy recipes.
Excited about the upcoming fall season. Already planning which new anime to watch and which gym goals to set.
Challenged by my new coding projects. Learning Rust is tough but fascinating. The concepts are really clicking.
Proud of sticking to my new, stricter diet. Abs are starting to show more definition. All Might cosplay, here I come!
Nostalgic after finding my old manga collection while cleaning. Spent the evening re-reading some volumes of 'Fullmetal Alchemist'.
Excited about the upcoming hackathon at work. Already brainstorming ideas with my team.
Focused on preparation for the hackathon. Learning Rust is already paying off - it might give us an edge.
Exhausted but exhilarated after the hackathon. Our team came in second place! The judges loved our use of Rust for performance optimization.
Amused by Nibbles' latest achievement: she learned how to open the treat drawer. Need to find a new hiding spot!
Anxious about the upcoming annual fitness competition at my gym. I've been training hard, but the competition looks tough.
Thrilled! Placed third in my weight class at the fitness competition. All those early mornings and strict dieting paid off.
Content after a relaxing post-competition week. Allowed myself some cheat meals and extra anime time. Balance is key.
Intrigued by a new data science conference coming up. The speaker list looks impressive. Just booked my ticket!
Frustrated with a challenging bug at work. Spent the whole day debugging, but at least I'm learning a lot.
Relieved to have finally squashed that bug. My team's support was invaluable. Celebrated with a marathon of 'Jujutsu Kaisen'.
Excited about Halloween! Working on a low-key Saitama (One Punch Man) costume. Ordered a bald cap online.
Proud of my Halloween costume. Won the office contest! Though I think Nibbles was a bit freaked out by the bald cap.
Happy after a fun Halloween night. Handed out anime-themed candies to trick-or-treaters. The kids loved it!
Nervous about my presentation at the upcoming data science conference. It's my first time speaking at such a big event.
Elated! My conference talk went even better than expected. Got great questions and made some valuable connections.
Inspired by all the new ideas from the conference. Can't wait to implement some of them at work.
Grateful for my team at work. They're so supportive of the new methodologies I learned at the conference.
Determined to finish my Rust projects before the year ends. Making good progress!
Excited for Thanksgiving tomorrow. Planning to try a new turkey recipe and binge-watch the new season of my favorite anime.
Content after a lovely Thanksgiving weekend. The turkey was a success, and Nibbles enjoyed the little bit of plain meat I gave her.
Motivated to end the year strong at the gym. December is usually busy, so I'm frontloading my workouts.
Nostalgic while putting up Christmas decorations. Found some old anime-themed ornaments from college.
Proud of wrapping up my last major project at work for the year. It's been a productive twelve months!
Amused by Nibbles' fascination with the Christmas tree. Had to kitten-proof all the low-hanging ornaments.
Excited about the office Christmas party tomorrow. My ugly Christmas sweater features Sailor Moon characters. It's hideous and I love it.
Happy after the Christmas party. My sweater was a hit! Also, secret Santa got me a limited edition figurine I've been eyeing. Score!
Reflective as the year comes to a close. It's been a journey of growth, both personally and professionally. Grateful for every moment.
Stressed about last-minute Christmas shopping, but the holiday anime marathons on TV are keeping me sane.
Content after a quiet Christmas at home with Nibbles. Video-called family and friends, watched my favorite Christmas episodes of various anime series.
Excited for the New Year! Setting my resolutions: level up in my career, maybe compete in a powerlifting event, and definitely attend more anime conventions!
